hero.name: Lylian Challier
hero.description: MSc student at CentraleSupelec, specialized in mathematics, Machine Learning and Deep Learning. This year, I was selected for the Digital Tech Year, an innovation program that allows me to develop strong skills in agile prototyping through concrete projects for Renault Group, the French National Library and Matmut.
hero.subdescription: Having these skills is essential to move from theory to practice. I can thus contribute at several stages of a project: mathematical theory, model architecture, optimization algorithms, results interpretation as well as deployment.

starProject.label: Featured Project
starProject.title: AI Travel Planner
starProject.desc: Personal project using WebScraping and ColPali visual RAG for a travel planning agent. Ongoing project set to grow with additional features like MCP protocol tools.

latestPost.title: Explainable AI in Turbulent Convection
latestPost.excerpt: Summary of the research project conducted at LISN on discovering physical laws with explainable AI...

turbulence.title: Explainable Models for Turbulent Convection
turbulence.desc: Discovery of wall laws in turbulent convection with SINDy and symbolic KANs.

vae.desc: Implementation of 3 trainable VAE architectures for image generation.
